content: Sounds like a fun challenge! Think of an object and I'll start asking yes or no questions to guess it. Ready?
Exciting! I'll think of an object, and you can start asking yes or no questions to guess what it is. Have a question in mind?
Sure! Ask me a question, and I'll do my best to answer it. Let's put those thinking caps on!
16, well done! Looks like we're both acing this quiz. Keep those questions coming!
